insert.foreach:
insert into t_scheduler
name,
class_name,
cron_expression,
group_name,
trigger_name,
trigger_group,
description,
job_status,
job_status_time,
version,

mapper.delete:
delete from t_scheduler where id in
#{id}
mapper.update:
update t_scheduler
name = #{name},
class_name = #{className},
cron_expression = #{cronExpression},
group_name = #{groupName},
trigger_name = #{triggerName},
trigger_group = #{triggerGroup},
description = #{description},
job_status = #{jobStatus},
job_status_time = #{jobStatusTime},
version = #{version},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_active = #{isActive},
update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
where id = #{id} and version + 1 <= #{version}

update.foreach:
update t_scheduler
name = #{item.name},
class_name = #{item.className},
cron_expression = #{item.cronExpression},
group_name = #{item.groupName},
trigger_name = #{item.triggerName},
trigger_group = #{item.triggerGroup},
description = #{item.description},
job_status = #{item.jobStatus},
job_status_time = #{item.jobStatusTime},
version = #{item.version},
create_time = #{item.createTime},
update_time = #{item.updateTime},
is_active = #{item.isActive},
update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
version = version + 1,
where id = #{item.id}

mapper.sql: id as id, name as name, class_name as className, cron_expression as cronExpression, group_name as groupName, trigger_name as triggerName, trigger_group as triggerGroup, description as description, job_status as jobStatus, job_status_time as jobStatusTime, version as version, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, is_active as isActive
